TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteUrlExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 创建与指定的 URL 参数值对应的 URL。

span.span: Creates a URL that corresponds to specified URL parameter values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类通过提供 URL 参数值的列表，可以将服务器控件的属性设置为路由的 URL。The class makes it possible to set the property of a server control to the URL of a route by providing a list of URL parameter values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建标记，该标记用于生成包含为路由设置格式的 URL 的超链接。The following example shows how to create markup that generates a hyperlink with a URL that is formatted for a route. 路由是使用 `http://www.contoso.com/search/{searchterm}` 作为 URL 模式来定义的。The route is defined by using `http://www.contoso.com/search/{searchterm}` as the URL pattern. ``` Search for Bicycles ``` 为此超链接生成的 URL 将为 `http://www.contoso.com/search/Bicycles` 。The URL generated for this hyperlink would be `http://www.contoso.com/search/Bicycles`. 如果提供给表达式的 URL 参数不足 `RouteUrl` 以唯一标识路由，则必须包含路由名称。If the URL parameters provided to the `RouteUrl` expression are not sufficient to uniquely identify a route, you must include the route name. 例如，如果 Web 应用程序有两个路由 `searchterm` 作为唯一的 URL 参数，则必须使用路由名称来定义路由，并且超链接标记将类似于以下示例：For example, if a Web application has two routes with `searchterm` as the sole URL parameter, the routes would have to be defined by using route names, and the hyperlink markup would resemble the following example: ``` Search for Bicycles ```

span.span: ASP.NET Routing

related.span: 如何：访问路由页中的 URL 参数

span.span: How to: Access URL Parameters in a Routed Page

Properties for the control or page.

summary.span: 创建与指定的 URL 参数值和路由 URL 格式对应的 URL。

span.span: Creates a URL that corresponds to specified URL parameter values and to a route URL format.

returns.span: 与指定的 URL 参数值和所选路由对应的 URL。

span.span: The URL that corresponds to the specified URL parameter values and to the selected route.

returns.span: 此路由是通过将路由 URL 模式与指定的参数列表相匹配来选择的。

span.span: The route is selected by matching route URL patterns to the specified list of parameters.

returns.span: 如果有多个路由与指定的参数列表相匹配，则还可以指定路由名称以指示要选择哪个路由。

span.span: In case more than one route matches a specified list of parameters, a route name can also be specified to indicate which route to select.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在标记中遇到以下形式的表达式时，ASP.NET 调用此方法：ASP.NET calls this method when an expression of the following form is encountered in markup: `<%$ RouteUrl: urlparameter=value %>` 此方法为当前对象的指定路由键值生成相应的 URL 。This method generates the appropriate URL for the specified route-key values for the current object. 此方法将重写 方法。This method overrides the method. 它从参数获取对 `entry` 表达式绑定到的控件的引用，该参数从要 `context` 计算的表达式的参数获取，并调用 方法来生成 URL。It gets from the `entry` parameter a reference to the control to which the expression is bound, it gets from the `context` parameter the expression to be evaluated, and it calls the method to generate the URL.

summary.span: 返回一个代码表达式，该表达式用于在生成的页类中为属性赋值。

span.span: Returns a code expression that is used to perform the property assignment in the generated page class.

returns.span: 属性赋值中使用的 实例。

span.span: A instance that is used in the property assignment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为页或控件创建 CodeDOM 时，将调用此方法。This method is called when the CodeDOM is created for a page or control. 返回的对象表示要添加到生成的页类中的属性分配的代码表达式。The object that is returned represents the code expression to add to the property assignment in the generated page class.

summary.span: 创建与为路由 URL 格式指定的路由键对应的 URL。

span.span: Creates a URL that corresponds to specified route keys for a route URL format.

returns.span: 与当前 对象的路由 URL 格式对应的 URL。

span.span: The URL that corresponds to the route URL format of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过调用对象的方法为 URL 生成合适的值 。This method generates the appropriate value for the URL by calling the method of the object. 它 从参数中获取对象 `control` ，并从参数分析路由名称和路由参数 `expression` 。It gets the object from the `control` parameter, and it parses the route name and route parameters from the `expression` parameter.

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 该方法无法分析标记中指定的表达式。

span.span: The method was unable to parse the expression that was specified in markup.
For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可在未编译的页中计算表达式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示方法是否已 在类中实现，并且可在未编译的页中返回表达式的值。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class and can return a value for the expression in a page that is not compiled. 类可以在未编译的页中计算表达式。The class can evaluate an expression in a page that is not compiled. 因此， 属性始终返回 `true` 。Therefore, the property always returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryParseRouteExpression (string expression, System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary routeValues, out string routeName);
.method public static hidebysig bool TryParseRouteExpression(string expression, class System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary routeValues, [out] string& routeName) cil managed
Public Shared Function TryParseRouteExpression (expression As String, routeValues As RouteValueDictionary, ByRef routeName As String) As Boolean
public: static bool TryParseRouteExpression(System::String ^ expression, System::Web::Routing::RouteValueDictionary ^ routeValues, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % routeName);
static member TryParseRouteExpression : string * System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary * string -> bool

span.span: The expression as specified in markup.

param.name: routeValues
param.span: 路由键及其关联值的集合。

span.span: The collection of route keys and their associated values.

param.name: routeName
param.span: 此方法返回时，如果 包含名为 RouteName 的路由键，此参数则包含一个表示路由名称的字符串。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the name of the route, if contains a route key named RouteName.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 将表达式分析为路由键和值的集合，还可以分析为路由名称。

span.span: Parses an expression into a collection of route keys and values, and optionally into a route name.

returns.span: 如果分析成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if parsing was successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从表达式中去除前导空格和尾随空格，然后使用逗号作为分隔符将其拆分为键/值对。The method strips leading and trailing spaces from the expression, and then splits it into key/value pairs by using commas as delimiters. 如果找到名为的路由键 `RouteName` ，则该值传递回 `routeName` 参数而不是中 `routeValues` 。If the route key named `RouteName` is found, that value is passed back in the `routeName` parameter and not in `routeValues`. 否则， `null` 将返回 `routeName` 。Otherwise, `null` is returned for `routeName`. 前导空格和尾随空格还会从单个键和值中去除。Leading and trailing spaces are also stripped from individual keys and values. `false` 如果表达式不由至少一个值为格式*键值*的键/值对组成 `=` *value*，且使用逗号分隔多个对，则方法返回。The method returns `false` if the expression is not composed of at least one key/value pair that is in the format *key*`=`*value*, and that uses commas to separate multiple pairs.
